indeed, us lefties are a clever bunch, I even mix my sports up between 
left and right

Rich



Gordon Robson wrote:

> What I meant was, as in my own case, I use my left hand for eating, 
> writing
> and using small tools like scissors, but I play all sports with my right
> hand. I do not think that your typical right-handed person does that.
>
>
>
> Gordon
